Package AiController

Interface AiControllerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AiController
    public interface AiControllerInterface
    The controller manages the AI. From here, messages are sent to the server using the NetClient and calculations are coordinated.

    • Method Detail

      • sendConnectRequest

        void sendConnectRequest​(java.lang.String clientName)
        Send a connect request to the server with the client name and client type (ENGINE_PLAYER)
        Parameters:
        clientName - is the name of the AI, which is entered at the start of the program in the console

      • loginRequestIsValid

        void loginRequestIsValid​(int clientId)
        This method is called when the client successfully connects to the server. The client id is saved
        Parameters:
        clientId - is the id assigned by the server

      • loginRequestNotValid

        void loginRequestNotValid()
        This method is called if the client was unable to connect to the server.

      • gameJoinAccepted

        Game host assigned the AI â€‹â€‹to a game

        Is called when game start, choose an algorithm and create the logic for the game

      • stopGame

        void stopGame()
        Is called when game stop

      • resumeGame

        void resumeGame()
        Is called when game resumes

      • pauseGame

        void pauseGame()
        Is called when game is paused

      • currentPlayer

        void currentPlayer​(int clientId)
        Is called every time the next player is on Turn
        Parameters:
        clientId - is the id of the current player

      • setTilesOnHand

        void setTilesOnHand​(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> tiles)
        Is called every time the AI get new tiles
        Parameters:
        tiles - An ArrayList of all tiles added to the AI's hand

      • setTilesOnMap

        void setTilesOnMap​(java.util.ArrayList<Tuple<Coordinate,​Tile>> coordTiles)
        Is called every time the server set tiles on the map
        Parameters:
        tiles - A List of all tiles added to the map

      • tileSwapIsValid

        void tileSwapIsValid()
        Notify the AI â€‹â€‹if the swap is valid
        Parameters:
        isValid - true, if the swap is valid

      • printWinner

        void printWinner​(Winner winner)
        Print the winner of the current game
        Parameters:
        winner - message from Server with the winner and score
